# Causal inference {#causal}

* Assumes that random variables are connected through cause and effect.
* Builds a causal model from which statistical estimators are derived.
* A [statistical modeling mindset](#statistical-modeling) that adds causality to [frequentist](#frequentism) and [Bayesian](#bayesian) inference.
